allAvailableResources_summit.description: Current level of all available resources given as an integer percentage for each particular resource. The data is obtained from the machine's sensors but can be set manually in case the sensors are broken.

possibleLaunchfiles_summit.description: The list of possible launchfiles. Doesn't depend on the available resources.

triggerBringup_summit.title: Trigger ROS launchfiles
triggerBringup_summit.description: Brings hw components up (corresponding ROS launch files are launched). Accepts launchfile id as input. Brings up all if no input is specified.

launchfileId.description: Defines what HW to bring up, launchfileId is one of possibleLaunchfiles property values, e.g., bringup_complete

output.description: Returns True/false and a message when all invoked promises are resolved (asynchronous).

mapStoreDB_summit.title: Store map on DB
mapStoreDB_summit.description: Get map data and store it to DB of the VO

filename_tosave.description: which filename to save map in db

mapReadDB_summit.title: Read map from DB
mapReadDB_summit.description: Get map from DB of the VO

filename_map.description: which filename to get from db

output.description: Returns map in string format from DB on VO.

filenamesReadDB_summit.title: Read map from DB
filenamesReadDB_summit.description: Get map from DB of the VO

output.description: Returns map in string format from DB on VO.

filenames_db.description: which filename to get from db

bagStoreVO_summit.title: Store rosbag on VO's FS
bagStoreVO_summit.description: Get rosbag data and store it to FS of the VO

filename_tosave.description: which filename to save rosbag on FS

currentValues_summit.description: Returns current Values for battery status from summit through the Consumed Thing

outOfResource_summit.description: Out of resource event. Emitted when the available resource level is not sufficient to operate further (e.g., battery level).
